ViewImplementation.ViewSQL: select b.BATCHNUMBER, bbis.SEQUENCE, C.ID as LINKEDID, ncu.USERNAME, c.LOOKUPID as LINKEDLOOKUPID, c.NAME LINKEDNAME, bbis.FIRSTNAME + bbis.KEYNAME as BBNCCONSTITNAME, (select count(*) from dbo.SPONSORSHIP where CONSTITUENTID = c.ID and STATUSCODE = 1) as SPONSORSHIPCOUNT, spouse.LOOKUPID as SPOUSELOOKUPID, spouse.NAME as SPOUSENAME, (select count(*) from dbo.SPONSORSHIP where CONSTITUENTID = spouse.ID and STATUSCODE = 1) as SPOUSESPONSORSHIPCOUNT, EMAILADDRESSTYPECODE.Description as EMAILTYPE, BBISEmailAddresses.EmailAddress as EMAILADDRESS, case when BBISEmailAddresses.EmailAddress is null then 'blank' when upper (primaryemail.emailaddress) = upper(BBISEmailAddresses.EmailAddress) then 'MATCHES PRIMARY' when exists (select 1 from emailaddress where CONSTITUENTID = c.ID and upper (emailaddress) = upper(BBISEmailAddresses.EmailAddress)) then 'MATCHES non primary' else 'no match' end as EMAILMATCH, primaryemail.EMAILADDRESS as PRIMARYEMAILADDRESS, case when upper (nonprimaryemail.emailaddress) = upper(BBISEmailAddresses.EmailAddress) then 'matches this other' else '' end as EMAILOTHERMATCH, nonprimaryemail.EMAILADDRESS as OTHEREMAILADDRESS, bbis.DateAdded as SIGNUPTRANSACTIONDATE from dbo.BATCHCONSTITUENTUPDATE bbis inner join dbo.BATCH b on bbis.BATCHID = b.ID left join dbo.BATCHCONSTITUENTUPDATEBBNCINFO bcubbis on bcubbis.BATCHCONSTITUENTUPDATEID = bbis.id left join dbo.NETCOMMUNITYCLIENTUSER ncu on ncu.bbncuserid = bcubbis.bbncuserid left join dbo.CONSTITUENT c on bbis.primaryrecordid = c.ID left join dbo.BATCHCONSTITUENTUPDATEEMAILADDRESSES as BBISEmailAddresses on BBISEmailAddresses.BatchConstituentUpdateID = bbis.ID and BBISEmailAddresses.roworigincode = 1 left join dbo.EMAILADDRESSTYPECODE on EMAILADDRESSTYPECODE.id = BBISEmailAddresses.EMAILADDRESSTYPECODEID left join dbo.EMAILADDRESS primaryemail on c.ID = primaryemail.CONSTITUENTID and primaryemail.ISPRIMARY = 1 --left join dbo.EMAILADDRESS nonprimaryemail on c.ID = nonprimaryemail.CONSTITUENTID and nonprimaryemail.ISPRIMARY = 0 outer apply ( select top 1 * from dbo.EMAILADDRESS nonprimaryemail where c.ID = nonprimaryemail.CONSTITUENTID and nonprimaryemail.ISPRIMARY = 0) nonprimaryemail left join dbo.RELATIONSHIP spouserel on spouserel.RELATIONSHIPCONSTITUENTID = c.ID and spouserel.ISSPOUSE = 1 left join dbo.CONSTITUENT spouse on spouse.ID = spouserel.RECIPROCALCONSTITUENTID
